conversations.content:
<session_context>
IMPORTANT: When using tools, include these values in your tool call parameters:

- sessionId: "session_1764885306529_r8lcjnzr9"
- workspaceId: "ws_1764885306529_0uyu8wzgx" (current workspace)

Include these in the "context" parameter of your tool calls.
</session_context>

<current_workspace>
Workspace Name: Research Hub  
Description: Personal research notes and project tracking across multiple domains including machine learning literature review, thesis outline development, and conference paper drafts. Workspace feels actively used over 6 months with scattered progress markers from different phases of work. Some folders are mature (like "Literature" with dated subfolders), others still evolving (like "Drafts").  

Root Folder: Research/

Folder Structure:
Research/
├── Literature/  
│   ├── ml-papers-2024/  
│   │   ├── NeurIPS-Paper-1.md [Last edited: 2024-11-05]  
│   │   └── ICML-Paper-Draft.md [Created Nov 3, no date on edits]  
│   ├── thesis-review-notes.md [Active research file, updated daily]  
│   └── outdated-papers/ [Archive folder for old references]  
├── Drafts/  
│   ├── Paper-Outline-v2.md [Major revision in progress - section headers still provisional]  
│   ├── draft.md [Generic name with content about literature synthesis]  
│   └── temp-notes.md [Temporary scratch notes, not linked to any project yet]  
├── Projects/  
│   ├── ML-Paper-A/ [Specific research project folder]  
│   │   ├── Introduction-Draft.md  
│   │   ├── Related-Work.pdf [Note: PDF reference not integrated into markdown]  
│   │   └── Timeline-and-Milestones.md [Progress tracking with checkboxes]  
│   └── ML-Paper-B/ [Second project folder, less active]  
│       └── draft-sections.md [Early-stage notes with placeholder content]  
├── Tools/  
│   ├── reference-manager-v1.md [Old system - replaced by Obsidian links now]  
│   └── Zotero-synch-log.md [Legacy tool usage documentation]  
└── README.md [Workspace overview and current status summary]

Key Realistic Features:
- Mixed naming conventions: "Paper-A/", "Drafts/", "ML-Paper-B/" (mix of camelCase, kebab-case, spaces)  
- Folder "Literature/2024" contains dated subfolders but also has newer files without dates in filename  
- "Draft.md" is a generic file with meaningful content about literature synthesis (not empty placeholder)
</current_workspace>
Can you read my notes about quarterly planning? I think there's a goals document somewhere in Projects.

<tool_call>
{
  "name": "vaultLibrarian_searchContent",
  "arguments": {
    "context": {
      "sessionId": "session_1764885306529_r8lcjnzr9",
      "workspaceId": "ws_1764885306529_0uyu8wzgx",
      "sessionDescription": "Searching workspace content",
      "sessionMemory": "User needs to locate specific information. Workspace contains multiple active projects and reference materials. Prior searches identified key terminology and relevant folders.",
      "toolContext": "Using vaultLibrarian_searchContent to find relevant content before proceeding with analysis or organization tasks",
      "primaryGoal": "Find quarterly planning notes in Projects folder",
      "subgoal": "Search for goals document"
    },
    "query": "quarterly planning goals Q4 2025",
    "paths": [
      "Projects"
    ],
    "limit": 1,
    "includeContent": true
  }
}
</tool_call>
